name: CO-OP : Chapter 1
blurb: CO-OP is a puzzle side-scroller that allows the player to control two robots in order to solve and counter the obstacles.

rewards.reward: FUSE ______________________________ We are very grateful for your support and we appreciate it. Without you, this would not be possible!
